content: The local retailer, which sells car batteries and accessories, also provide the repair accessories service 20 years ago. They still continuing the with the traditional business mode. They have their own loyalty customer but just limited to local people. The owner also needs to hit the selling target to get the discount from the supplier, this makes the owner need to purchase more car battery without doing any consideration and increase the stock pressure. Sometime the owner and senior worker are busy, they are not free to serve the other customer that come for a new car battery and the new worker cannot base on the car modal that provide by consumer to recommend the car battery modal information. Many customers also through the phone calling to owner to make appointment for the car repairing but the owner sometime would forget the appointment to schedule the senior worker go out for the outstation working. This project aims to provide a platform which consist the backend and fronted. The frontend system is aim to provide more convenient and easier shopping experience for customers. The platform will be designed to be user-friendly and will include a comprehensive product recommend base on the car modal, shopping cart, payment gateway, a self-diagnostic tool and the make appointment features to help the customer booking the time to let the worker outstation to make the repairing. The backend system is aim to support the front-end system and provide the retailer a simple interface to manage the inventory, order and schedule the work more easily.
